name: @raydeck/session-manager
description: Session manager to manage caching class data in serverless contexts

scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --readme none --mode file --excludeNotExported --includeVersion --out docstemp && rm README.md && concat-md docstemp > README.md && rm -rf docstemp
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn build && yarn docs && git commit README.md -m "docs: updating docs" && git push

author: Ray Deck
